titleStmt.title: A vvarning to drunkards by the sad and suddain death of John Woolman, of Sarret, in the county of Hartford. With a letter of exhortation written to the people on that sorrowful occasion. By William Jole, minister of Sarret.
titleStmt.author: Jole, William, d. ca. 1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for N.P. and sold by Rich. Janua, in Queens-Head Court, in Pater-Noster Row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
